pullrequest.title: Use the new multicopter velocity controller for UAVs

content.raw:
The Quad hovers with `rostopic pub /R1/cmd_vel geometry_msgs/Twist "{}" "{}"`, but the Hex doesn’t `rostopic pub /R2/cmd_vel geometry_msgs/Twist "{}" "{}"`\`

I had to use `rostopic pub /R2/cmd_vel geometry_msgs/Twist "{x: 0.0, z: 0.1}" "{}"` instead.
content.html:
The Quad hovers with rostopic pub /R1/cmd_vel geometry_msgs/Twist "{}" "{}", but the Hex doesn’t rostopic pub /R2/cmd_vel geometry_msgs/Twist "{}" "{}"`

I had to use rostopic pub /R2/cmd_vel geometry_msgs/Twist "{x: 0.0, z: 0.1}" "{}" instead.
